abstract: Witnesses begin testifying in murder trial of James E Holmes, charged with killing 12 people and wounding 70 others inside an Aurora, Colo, movie theater in 2012; prosecutors say they are likely to create witness-by-witness, bullet-by-bullet, reconstruction of event in effort to show jurors full extent of chaos and human suffering caused by Holmes.
lead_paragraph: Tuesday marked the beginning of what is likely to be a witness-by-witness, bullet-by-bullet reconstruction of what happened at a theater in Aurora on July 20, 2012.

headline.main: Aurora Shooting Victims Detail a Night of Terror at the Trial of James E. Holmes
headline.print_headline: Recalling a Night of Terror in Colorado

snippet: Tuesday marked the beginning of what is likely to be a witness-by-witness, bullet-by-bullet reconstruction of what happened at a theater in Aurora on July 20, 2012.
